item.description:
A Muse “Grand Opening” and Make & Take! (FREE!) A Muse has arrived at Abeille. We’d like to celebrate – and you’re invited! The first 50 customers to visit the store between 1 and 2:30 pm on Sunday, June 7 will be able to make one handmade card (from two available options) for free! Liz Ballard, Certified A Muse Instructor, will be on hand to offer helpful tips. We’ll also have snacks and will be giving away a door prize.

And, if you’d like to stick around for more A Muse fun, sign up for the A Muse Birthdays, Brides, Babies & Blossoms class with Liz that will begin at 2:30 pm! Date: Sunday, June 7th at 1:00 pm - 2:30pm, cost: $25 http://www.abeille.us...

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: A Muse Card Make and Take (Free)
